title: 客户端崩溃
author: qq1021476868
txt_content:
[15:02:47] [main/INFO]: Setting user: NZdalao[15:02:47] [main/INFO]: (Session ID is token:f4eeb9e5fb284009acd0870187dd1d78:54e3588b9a08a4c40c66c9885a79e4c7)
[15:02:48] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.1
[15:02:48] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default

Starting up SoundSystem...
Initializing LWJGL OpenAL
    (The LWJGL binding of OpenAL.  For more information, see file:///C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\Tencent\QQ\Temp\%W@GJ$ACOF(TYDYECOKVDYB.pnghttp://www.lwjgl.org 

)
OpenAL initialized.

[15:02:49] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started

#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x0000000058ab2a08, pid=10924, tid=10788
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_66-b18) (build 1.8.0_66-b18)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.66-b18 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:

在网吧  1.7.10的任何版本只要点多人输入服务器IP就进入就会崩溃 直接闪退  JAVA8内存  设置2G   系统WIN7    虚拟内存OK

replies.author: 【捣蛋】
replies.txt_content:
1 客户端问题请到综合问答区提问
2 请附上客户端crast-report最新报错

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
